attributes.action: Fine people who make stupid costly petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned suggest that people who create petitions which would create an unjust public expenditure to police, e.g. the “petition to fine people who drive when there is public transport available” should be fined as required!  Fines can be placed in a spectrum ranging from direct bank fines to capital punishment.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
